verbs.description: Four former first ladies — Rosalynn Carter , Hillary Clinton , Laura Bush , and Michelle Obama — [V: have] denounced the Trump administration ’s “ zero - tolerance ” policy that separates immigrant families from their children at the U.S .- Mexico border .
